title: cintayEham jAnakIkAntam
sahitya:
cintayEham jAnakIkAntam santatam cintitArtta dAyaka-
manila sutanutam kAnti vijita danapatim dayAnvitam


anupallavi

  danti santOSam shrtatAnta brndArcitam shAnta cittam mukha vijita kAnta nishAkAntam


caraNam    pankajAkSam raghuvaram mOdakaram kankaNAdi bhUSaNadharam
lankEsha madaharam  pankajOd-bhavatyamara sankaTa vinAshakaram 
sankarSaNam shrIkaram shankha cakradharam vAsudEvam harim
